IdeologyTree.Description: Mainstream conservatism has failed. Becoming a watered-down liberalism, there is a need for a new, true conservatism to rise up. Socially traditionalist, isolationist, and always with America First in mind economically, paleoconservatism seeks to return America to the roots they believe the Founding Fathers set.
